NUMBERPOSITION

Home Leaderboard About

About the Game

"NUMBER POSITION" is a fun and interactive number guessing game where players compete to find a secret 4-digit number by making guesses. The game provides immediate feedback on how many numbers are correct in value and position.

This project was created to help players enhance their logical thinking and enjoy a classic puzzle in a competitive environment.

Contact

Check my GitHub for more: GitHub Profile

Or contact me via email: kingnanfo@gmail.com

); }; export default AboutPage;
